citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 4:35PM on
December 6th, 2022. The licensee was contacted via phone and stated that he was out of town and no one else was
available to do the inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 4:35PM on 
December 6th, 2022. The licensee was contacted via phone and stated that he was out of town and no one else was 
available to do the inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
